charges.charge_description: 21:846=CM.F CONSPIRACY TO MANUFACTURE CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE -- Attempt to manufacture methamphetamine, a schedule II controlled substance; 18 USC 2: Aiding and abetting(1)

charges.charge_disposition: 30 Months Custody; 3 years Supervised Release; $1000 Fine; and $100 Special Assessment
